Articles.Content:
Hi all

KSP: 0.90 32bits Windows

Problem: Well, since an image is worth a thousand words there goes a video

This problems trigger when i hit 6.000 meters (about 40 seconds in the video) and i don't know exactly what happens, i think it's like the center of mass gets displaced or something.

In the video you can see that i cut the gas so you the weird rocket movement is more evident.

I don't exactly know how to replicate it, because the game has been stable for the whole day and then, without adding any mod or uninstalling anything it starts happening (maybe a save game corruption)

Mods installed:

Thanks in advance!

Edited December 29, 2014 by kn915

Hey i ran to same issue and i fixed by updating RealShute mod hotfix v1.2.6.3

Here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/57988-0-90-x-Wenkel-Corporation-RealChute-Parachute-Systems-v1-2-6-3-28-12-14-paused/page291

I hoped i helped you.

i tried that and it doesn't work in that save but it works in new games, so i guess i'm starting, good thing it was a fresh install

Thanks for the help!
